ðŸ“– Summary: Scrcpy mirrors and controls Android devices on a computer via USB or TCP/IP, enabling users to interact with their device using the computer's keyboard and mouse. It supports features like audio forwarding, screen recording, and virtual displays, offering a seamless control experience without requiring root access or an app installation on the device.
